name: My Room.
description:
Hey all! This is Game Jam no.4! Very excited to have been able to participate in the Indie Tales Jam with this level of improvement in my Pixel Art skillset. 

The theme for this Jam was 'One Room' and so being reluctant to make another Bullet Storm like the previous Jam I had participated in 'Ricochet Rampage', I decided to go for a more laidback and comedic approach to the 'One Room' theme. 

Set in my room, this game is a short interactive ritualistic style game showing the importance of getting things done properly in your room before you seize the day!

Motivation was a little hard to find when it came to the later stages of uploading this game to the jam under the current lockdown predicaments of Australia, but nevertheless...

Hope you enjoy!
